seo.title: Reserve your tickets – Paris 2024 Olympic ticketing
seo.description: Bachelor’s project: online ticket reservation site for the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. Easily book your seats, manage your cart and enjoy a modern, multilingual interface.
seo.keywords: ticketing, Olympic Games, Paris 2024, ticket reservation, booking site, modern interface, multilingual, React, web development, cart management, user experience
